fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch KS from 1_8_X branch
2. Run Base UI > Views > Table Views > Table Search
3. Click "Show" then "Hide"

Actual: Cannot hide the search bar.
Expected: Should be able to hide the table search bar after pressing "Hide".

Note: 
* Was able to hide table's search bar in 1.8.0.1
* No unusual messages or errors in the console. Only message being printed out when pressing the hide button is:
{code}
Jan 24 11:18:19 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.titanium[0x10d4][18522] <Notice>: [INFO] search hidden = true
{code}
fields.summary: iOS: Table Search - In KS, cannot hide search bar in Table Search test
fields.environment:
SDK build: 1.8.1.v20120123130147
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.8.201201210622
xcode: 4.2
Device: iPhone 4S Sprint (5.0.1)
